BIO

29-year-old from Ljubljana, specifically Šentvid, with finished gymnasium education. I have also finished a Smartninja Web Development class. I like company and usually get along great with everyone, either work or free time related.

Big fan of sports, as a player and a spectator. I do running, football, martial arts and during the weekend you will often find me in mountains. And not just during the weekends, I prefer spending my summer in Bohinj rather than by the sea. BTW, the easiest way to start a morning conversation with me is: "Did you see the game yesterday?"

One of my biggest passions is cooking. It started as a home cook, later I also worked in professional kitchen a few years. But now I am just a star of home BBQs and my family's head chef.

Definitely a dog person. Had a dog by my side for most of my life. Proud owner of 8-year-old bulldog mix Šaja, who take most of my free time.
